edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6

Class ArgumentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jhu.zpalmer2.spring2009.ai.hw6.ArgumentHandler

  • public class ArgumentHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles parsing command-line arguments for the reinforcement learning software.

        Parameters:
        intParams - The integer parameters to parse.

        stringParams - The string parameters to parse.
        booleanParams - The boolean parameters to parse.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String[] args)
           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses the provided arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - The arguments to use.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the arguments are poorly formatted. If this is the case, the exception's message is human-readable and describes the problem.
